params.amount: Amount to be escrowed in wei.
params.deadline: Time window (in seconds) after which buyer can request refund.

returns.escrowId: The ID of the created escrow.

params.escrowId: The ID of the escrow to fund.
The ID of the escrow to query.

returns._0: EscrowDetails struct with full escrow information.

params.escrowId: The ID of the escrow to release funds from.
The ID of the escrow to request refund from.
The ID of the escrow dispute to resolve.
params.releaseFundsToSeller: True to release funds to seller, false to refund buyer.

createEscrow(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Creates a new escrow agreement between buyer and seller.

fundEscrow(uint256).notice: Fund the escrow by sending the agreed amount.

getEscrowDetails(uint256).notice: Retrieves the details of a given escrow.

pause().notice: Pause the contract, disabling critical functions.

releaseFunds(uint256).notice: Allows the seller to release funds once transaction conditions are met.

requestRefund(uint256).notice: Buyer can request refund after deadline if conditions are not met.

resolveDispute(uint256,bool).notice: Arbiter resolves disputes by deciding to release funds to seller or refund buyer.

unpause().notice: Unpause the contract, enabling critical functions.
